JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Shipment Package
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
pick_ticket_no,
1 as line_no,
ship_date,
pt.order_no as order_no,
pt.invoice_no as invoice_no,
isnull(convert(varchar(10),pt.carrier_id),'') as carrier_id,
a.name as Carrier,
isnull(tracking_no,'') as tracking_no,
isnull(instructions,'') as instructions,
pt.freight_out as freight_out
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
oe_pick_ticket pt (NOLOCK)
join oe_hdr oh (NOLOCK) on oh.order_no = pt.order_no
join customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = oh.customer_id
left join address a (NOLOCK) on  a.id = pt.carrier_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
pt.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
c.delete_flag = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
pt.ship_date >= getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Shipment Header
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
pick_ticket_no,
ship_date,
pt.order_no as order_no,
pt.invoice_no as invoice_no,
isnull(convert(varchar(10),pt.carrier_id),'') as carrier_id,
isnull(tracking_no,'') as tracking_no,
isnull(instructions,'') as instructions,
pt.freight_out as freight_out
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
oe_pick_ticket pt (NOLOCK)
join oe_hdr oh (NOLOCK) on oh.order_no = pt.order_no
join customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = oh.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
pt.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
c.delete_flag = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
pt.ship_date >= getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: warehouse/Location
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
location_id,
location_name
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: location
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and delete_flag = 'N' and
location_id in (select distinct preferred_location_id from address where customer = 'Y' and delete_flag = 'N')

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Product Inventory
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
item_id,
location_id,
qty_on_hand - qty_allocated as QtyAvailable,
safety_stock,
moving_average_cost
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
inv_mast im (NOLOCK) 
JOIN inv_loc il (NOLOCK) ON il.inv_mast_uid = im.inv_mast_uid
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
qty_on_hand - qty_allocated > 0 and
inactive = 'N' and 
im.delete_flag = 'N'  and 
il.delete_flag = 'N' and 
product_type = 'R' and 
suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y' and
il.location_id in (select distinct preferred_location_id from address where customer = 'Y' and delete_flag = 'N')

Name: P21:06 - Order Assignment
Description: Standard P21 Order Assignment refresh - run before order history runs or else order may be duplicated.

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Assign Orders
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
web_reference_no as WebOrderNumber,
order_no as ErpOrderNumber
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
oe_hdr oh (NOLOCK) join
customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = oh.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
oh.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
oh.taker = 'ESTORE' and
oh.delete_flag = 'N' and
oh.rma_flag = 'N' and oh.projected_order = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
oh.order_no > '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21StartingOrderNumber}' and
oh.date_last_modified > getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Invoice Header
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
invoice_no,
order_no,
ih.customer_id as customer_id,
CASE 
  WHEN ship_to_id = ih.customer_id THEN ''
  ELSE CONVERT(varchar(50),ship_to_id)
END as ShipTo_Id,
invoice_date,
net_due_date,
ih.terms_id as terms_id,
invoice_type,
ship_date,
bill2_name,
bill2_address1,
bill2_address2,
bill2_city,
bill2_state,
bill2_postal_code,
bill2_country,
ship2_name,
ship2_address1,
ship2_address2,
ship2_city,
ship2_state,
ship2_postal_code,
ship2_country,
carrier_name,
terms_desc,
po_no,
ih.salesrep_id as salesrep_id,
freight,
total_amount,
other_charge_amount,
tax_amount,
total_amount - other_charge_amount - tax_amount as ProductTotal,
total_amount - amount_paid as InvoiceBalance,
CASE 
  when paid_in_full_flag = 'N' then 1 else 0
END as OpenInvoice
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
invoice_hdr ih (NOLOCK) join
customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = ih.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
c.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
c.delete_flag = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
ih.invoice_date > getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Invoice Detail
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
ih.invoice_no as invoice_no,
line_no,
0 as release_no,
item_id,
item_desc,
unit_price,
extended_price,
qty_requested,
qty_shipped,
unit_of_measure
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
invoice_line il (NOLOCK) join
invoice_hdr ih (NOLOCK) on ih.invoice_no = il.invoice_no join
customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = ih.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
c.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
c.delete_flag = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
ih.invoice_date >getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Order Header
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
order_no,
oh.customer_id as customer_id,
order_date,
web_reference_no,
c.customer_name as customer_name,
phys_address1,
phys_address2,
phys_city,
phys_state,
phys_postal_code,
phys_country,
ship2_name,
ship2_add1,
ship2_add2,
ship2_add3,
ship2_city,
ship2_state,
ship2_country,
ship2_zip,
requested_date,
po_no,
terms,
ship_to_phone,
location_id,
oh.carrier_id as carrier_id,
delivery_instructions,
CASE Completed
  WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Complete'
  ELSE 'Open'
END as Status,
(select sum(extended_price) from oe_line ol (NOLOCK) where ol.order_no = oh.order_no and ol.delete_flag = 'N') as Subtotal,
(select sum(sales_tax) from oe_line ol (NOLOCK) where ol.order_no = oh.order_no and ol.delete_flag = 'N') as SalesTax
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
oe_hdr oh (NOLOCK) join
customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = oh.customer_id join
address a (NOLOCK) on a.id = oh.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
oh.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
oh.delete_flag = 'N' and
oh.rma_flag = 'N' and oh.projected_order = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
oh.order_no > '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21StartingOrderNumber}' and
oh.date_last_modified > getdate()-5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Order Detail
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
oh.order_no as order_no,
line_no,
0 as release_no,
qty_ordered,
unit_price,
extended_price,
unit_of_measure,
source_loc_id,
ol.extended_desc as extended_desc,
customer_part_number,
oh.customer_id as customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
oe_hdr oh (NOLOCK) join
oe_line ol (NOLOCK) on ol.order_no = oh.order_no join
inv_mast inv (NOLOCK) on inv.inv_mast_uid = ol.inv_mast_uid join
customer c (NOLOCK) on c.customer_id = oh.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
oh.delete_flag = 'N' and
ol.delete_flag = 'N' and
oh.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
oh.rma_flag = 'N' and oh.projected_order = 'N' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
oh.order_no > '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21StartingOrderNumber}' and
(oh.date_last_modified >  getdate()-5 or oh.date_last_modified > getdate()-5)

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: CrossSells (Substitutions)
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
a.item_id as PrimaryItem,
b.item_id as RelatedItem,
'ProductRelationship' as ListType,
'CrossSell' as ListValue
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
inv_sub sub (NOLOCK)
join inv_mast a  (NOLOCK) on a.inv_mast_uid = sub.inv_mast_uid
join inv_mast b  (NOLOCK) on b.inv_mast_uid = sub.sub_inv_mast_uid
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
sub.delete_flag <> 'Y' and
a.inactive = 'N' and a.delete_flag = 'N'  and a.product_type = 'R' and a.suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y' and b.inactive = 'N' and b.delete_flag = 'N'  and b.product_type = 'R' and b.suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Accessories
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
a.item_id as PrimaryItem,
b.item_id as RelatedItem,
'ProductRelationship' as ListType,
'Accessory' as ListValue
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
inv_accessory ia (NOLOCK)
join inv_mast a (NOLOCK) on a.inv_mast_uid = ia.parent_inv_mast_uid
join inv_mast b (NOLOCK) on b.inv_mast_uid = ia.child_inv_mast_uid
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
a.inactive = 'N' and a.delete_flag = 'N'  and a.product_type = 'R' and a.suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y' and 
b.inactive = 'N' and b.delete_flag = 'N'  and b.product_type = 'R' and b.suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Customer/Product
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
c.customer_id as CustomerNumber,
'' as CustomerSequence,
item_id,
their_item_id
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
inv_xref xref (NOLOCK)
join customer c (NOLOCK) on c.company_id = xref.company_id and c.customer_id = xref.customer_id
join inv_mast i (NOLOCK) on i.inv_mast_uid = xref.inv_mast_uid
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
xref.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
xref.delete_flag <> 'Y'  and
c.delete_flag <> 'Y' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y' and
i.inactive = 'N' and i.delete_flag = 'N'  and i.product_type = 'R' and i.suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y'
and
-- following removes duplicates
inv_xref_uid in (
	select inv_xref_uid from (select inv_xref_uid, row_number() over
	(Partition by company_id,customer_id,inv_mast_uid ORDER BY inv_xref_uid) as [ItemNumber]
	FROM inv_xref(NOLOCK)) a
	WHERE [ItemNumber] = 1)

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Sales Reps
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
c.id as SalesRepId,
c.first_name + ' ' + c.last_name as name,
title,
direct_phone,
CASE WHEN ltrim(rtrim(email_address)) = 'DNE' then '' else email_address END as email_address,
sales_manager_id
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: contacts c (NOLOCK)
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
id in
(select distinct salesrep_id from customer where company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}'
union
select distinct salesrep_id from ship_to_salesrep where company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}') and
c.delete_flag = 'N' and isnull(c.id,'') <> ''

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Carrier/Service
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
id as CarrierId,
id as ShipViaId,
name as Description
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: address (NOLOCK)
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause: delete_flag = 'N' and carrier_flag = 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: A/R Payment Terms
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause: terms_id, terms_desc, getdate() as ActivateOn
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: terms (NOLOCK)
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause: delete_flag = 'N'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Carriers
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
id as AddressId,
name
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: Address  (NOLOCK)
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause: delete_flag = 'N' and carrier_flag = 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: ShipTo Customers
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
customer_id,
a.id as sequence,
terms_id,
a.name as CompanyName,
phys_address1 as address1,
phys_address2 as address2,
phys_city as city,
phys_state as state,
phys_postal_code as postalcode,
CASE 
  WHEN ISNULL(phys_country,'') = '' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country = 'US' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country ='USA' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country = 'U.S.A.' then 'US'
  WHEN charindex('United st',phys_country) > 0 THEN 'US'
  ELSE ''
END as Country,
phys_country,
central_phone_number,
po_no_required, 
CASE currency_id
  WHEN '1' THEN 'USD'
END as CurrencyCode,
CASE 
  WHEN email_address = 'DNE' THEN ''
  WHEN email_address IS NULL THEN ''
  WHEN charindex(';',email_address) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(email_address,1,charindex(';',email_address)-1)
  ELSE email_address
END as email_address,
salesrep_id,
carrier_id,
preferred_location_id,
freight_code,
CASE c.delete_flag WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as IsActive
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer c (NOLOCK) 
join customer_type ct (NOLOCK) on ct.customer_type_uid = c.customer_type_cd and ct.customer_type = 'Customer'
join address a (NOLOCK) on a.corp_address_id = c.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
c.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
a.customer = 'N' and a.shipping_address = 'Y' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: BillTo Customers
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
customer_id,
'' as sequence,
credit_limit,
terms_id,
customer_name,
phys_address1 as address1,
phys_address2 as address2,
phys_city as city,
phys_state as state,
phys_postal_code as postalcode,
CASE 
  WHEN ISNULL(phys_country,'') = '' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country = 'US' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country ='USA' THEN 'US'
  WHEN phys_country = 'U.S.A.' then 'US'
  WHEN charindex('United st',phys_country) > 0 THEN 'US'
  ELSE ''
END as Country,
phys_country,
central_phone_number,
po_no_required, 
CASE currency_id
  WHEN '1' THEN 'USD'
END as CurrencyCode,
CASE shipping_address WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsShipTo,
CASE 
  WHEN email_address = 'DNE' THEN ''
  WHEN email_address IS NULL THEN ''
  WHEN charindex(';',email_address) > 0 THEN 
       SUBSTRING(email_address,1,charindex(';',email_address)-1)
  ELSE email_address
END as email_address,
salesrep_id,
preferred_location_id,
CASE c.delete_flag WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as IsActive
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer c (NOLOCK)
join customer_type ct (NOLOCK) on ct.customer_type_uid = c.customer_type_cd and ct.customer_type = 'Customer'
join address a (NOLOCK) on a.id = c.customer_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
c.company_id = '{IntegrationConnector_Prophet21Company}' and
c.web_enabled_flag = 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Product Master
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
item_id,
item_desc,
extended_desc,
net_weight, 
short_code,
upc_or_ean_id as UPCCode,
price1 as ListPrice,
sales_pricing_unit,
purchase_pricing_unit,
base_unit,
unspsc_code,
item_sales_tax_class,
sales_pricing_unit_size,
default_selling_unit,
hazmat_ormd_flag,
Keywords
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause: inv_mast  (NOLOCK)
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
inactive = 'N' and 
delete_flag = 'N'  and 
product_type = 'R' and 
suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Product Unit of Measure
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
im.item_id as ProductNumber,
uom.unit_of_measure as UOM,
unit_size as ConversionFactor
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
item_uom uom  (NOLOCK) join
inv_mast im  (NOLOCK) on 
im.inv_mast_uid = uom.inv_mast_uid
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
uom.delete_flag = 'N'  and 
im.delete_flag = 'N' and
product_type = 'R' and 
suppress_from_web_flag <> 'Y' and
unit_of_measure <> base_unit and
uom.selling_unit = 'Y'
